All Classes

Class Description
AntarcticRock
The rock that is seen in the game
ButtonController
The class that implements the functionality for the gui buttons
CannonProjectile
The projectile that will shoot from Sunmi's cannon in Level 1 and the stationary guns in Level 3.
CharacterInfo
An object that stores information about each character.
CharacterInfoUtil
Creates a list of all the objects containing the character information
CharacterType
Determines whether an object, for example the character info list, will store haters, supporters or both.
Game
Your main game entry point
GameLevel
The base class for all levels in the game.
GameStateData
Used to hold a dataset of all the attributes of a Game at a particular moment
GameStateHandler
Handles the state of the game
GameView
Defines the viewable area of the World.
GenericCharacter
A supporter or hater object.
GiveFocus  
HeliDropper
Drops the falling characters from a helicopter outside of the field of view, hence the name HeliDropper.
Hilux
The toyota Hilux that is seen in Levels 1 and 2
LevelChanger
Used to change the levels in the game
LevelOne
The first level of the game
LevelThree
The third level of the game
LevelTwo
The second level of the game
LevelType
Used to determine what the current level is
PolygonEditor
Very basic polygon editor.
ScoreKeeper
Generates the current score of the level.
StationaryGun
A gun that is mounted to a wall and shoots horizontally.
SunmiCannon
The controllable Sunmi Cannon
SunmiNet
A net that carried by Sunmi that the player controls is used to collect supporters to gain points in Level 2
SupporterHandler
Used to generate the supporters in Level 3
SupporterState
Determines the name and position of a supporter in level 3
